page.title: 14A Middle-aged view
page.content: Mrs.Blakeley was born in Corby and moved to Brigstock when she was 9. She has a part-time teaching job in Stanion. She met her husband when she was a member of Corby Operatic Society. She has a son aged 20 who works at RS Components and an 18 year old daughter who has just finished a course at Tresham College Corby. She also has a 9 year old girl. She says that there are hardly any strangers in the village and most people work outside the village. They once worked on farms or in the woodland, the clothing factory or the timberyard. There are a number of social activities in the village to which she belongs - Brigstock Historical Society, the WI, and the Parochial Church Council, and plays the church organ. She likes living in Brigstock.
